page.title: 11Annual Events in Frogmore.
page.content: There are three main events which take place in Frogmore every year. One is the{Regatta}when lots of people come to sit along the side of the estuary to watch the fun. Lots of local people compete against each other in small boats and there are lots of different races for both adults and children. There are also some novelty races. Another event is the{Jumble in the Sun which is a jumble sale held out of doors. The third event is the{Fun Day which is held in Heath's Field. It has races, a rounders' match (Sherford against Frogmore) which Frogmore usually win because they have more people, pony rides and stalls selling sweets, bubble gum, hot dogs, crisps and drinks. There is an admission charge of 20 pence for adults, children under 13 get in free.
